issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared with 'extern' instead of 'global', conflicting with the template and other solution files. This would prevent the function from being exported and break the intended linking of the studentâ€™s implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the line 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' so that the function is correctly exported for linking.
